title: Learning Analytics-Based Personalized Language Education Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and job-related language application experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric workplace language instruction for professionals in limited-technology contexts

learning_goals: Designing personalized feedback mechanisms based on individual language proficiency levels through analysis of learning activity data.
Securing the ability to analyze patterns in learning engagement, task performance, and assessment results using evidence-based approaches.
Establishing optimization strategies for blended educational materials (e.g., video/text/discussion activities) using learning analytics results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
